channel.title: [Delta]how to change the price of items in shops[Delta]
channel.description: How do i change the price of items in npc shops, looked in shops.cfg but didnt see nothing in there about prices. thanks

item.title: [Delta]how to change the price of items in shops[Delta]
item.dc:creator: @de_dust89 de dust89
item.description:
@de_dust89 wrote:

Item.cfg, the first three numbers…

I.E.

item = 1949	Fighter_hat	A_partially_charged_rod.	1	10	1	5	5	5	-7	-7	27	29	26	-3	28	0	0

The 10 is the selling-to price, the first 1 is the selling-back price and the second 1, is the alching ammount… rest are the bonuses…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 28, 2009, 11:22:50 am[/size][hr]

BACKUP YOUR ITEM.CFG FIRST SO IF YOU FUCKUP YOU CAN FIX INSTANTLY WITH THE MOST RECENT UPDATE!!!

Read full topic
item.source: [Delta]how to change the price of items in shops[Delta]
